message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to offer it for $12,500.  What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
